pub.citation: Drabkova, L. and C. Vlcek. 2007. The phylogenetic position of Oxychlo(Juncaceae): evidence from morphology, nuclear and plastid DNA regions. Taxon 56(1): 95-102.

pmmd.notes: Strict consensus tree based on rbcL, trnL intron and trnL-trnF intergenic spacer, matK and ITS1 & 2 sequence data showing the position of four Oxychlospecies. Numbers above branches indicate jackknife values. Length 3084, CI = 0.79, RI = 0.81.
